detail: React is one of the most popular JavaScript Library. I taught myself because there were many pros. I've read and seen hundreds of online tutorials, and made several projects with React like the JK Sports Club.
I've been studying Java for three semesters in college. I got 100%. It is very helpful to understand Object-Oriental Programming (OOP).

Node JS supports asynchronous mode, which is not supported by other back-end languages, as a single thread. This is easy and simple to use, and like the front end, using JavaScript is a big advantage. I used it for my personal projects by self-taught.
Bootstrap is a very convenient tool for designing websites quickly. I used it for most personal projects.
